definitions: Engage in activity for enjoyment and recreation rather than for serious or practical purpose.
Take part in a game or sport.
Manipulate or operate (a device, typically a record player or video player) to produce a sound or moving image.
Perform (a dramatic role) or act a part in a play or film.
Move lightly and quickly or irregularly.
Allow (a fish) to exhaust itself by pulling on the line.
examples: The children play in the park.
He played the role of Hamlet.
He played the salmon for an hour.
